author: protolambda
content: FYI: updated Rumor REPL with bugfixes: using a lexer to parse string arguments properly, and re-initializing some background things to work around Cobra (cli library) not supporting resetting flags to defaults (i.e. previously, after --tcp=9001, it defaulted to 9001 instead)
